name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A man in Hunan Province hacked and killed six people, including the elderly and children, after getting divorced. He was recently taken to the execution ground to be executed.
According to the notice of Changde Intermediate People's Court in Hunan Province, Wang Zhaojun divorced Zhang Meiyun in 2021. After killing Zhang Meiyun in the same year, Wang Zhaojun thought of the conflicts with Hu Dacheng and Yang Xianjun, so he hacked Hu Dacheng and his old mother to death. Then he went to Yang Xianjun's home and killed his 8-year-old daughter, 10-year-old son, and 46-year-old father. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi9JVDwbcAAO10q.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Yuyao, Zhejiang, a student from Yuyao Shinan Middle School reported that the director of the political education department searched students' schoolbags for contraband during lunch break, and his chili sauce and pickled cabbage were thrown away by the director, so he was so angry that he confronted the director and was dragged by the director. Previously, a student had his 1,000 yuan card confiscated. After posting the video online, he and his father were talked to by the vice principal and asked to delete the video. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886818920604274688/pu/img/MivviL6WDAPNefEP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"When facts and laws are not important, a guilty verdict is only a matter of time."

Ma Yanhu, a Muslim from Ningxia, has been working as a tourism organizer leading Chinese Muslims to the Islamic holy city of Mecca in Saudi Arabia for 20 years. For all Muslims who are physically and financially capable, the Hajj is a task that must be completed at least once in their lifetime.

However, after the introduction of the Regulations on Religious Affairs in 2018, Chinese officials began to crack down on such pilgrimages. In 2020, Chinese officials required that all pilgrimages must be organized by the Chinese Islamic Association, which is affiliated with the United Front Work Department.

Because of these restrictions, Ma Yanhu stopped leading groups to Mecca in 2020 in accordance with the regulations, and only helped believers book air tickets and apply for visas. However, on April 24, 2023, Ma Yanhu was still arrested on charges of "illegal operation and disrupting market order." Six months later,...
fullContent:
“当事实和法律都不重要时，有罪判决只是时间问题”。

马彦虎，一位来自宁夏的穆斯林，20年来，他一直从事带领中国穆斯林前往沙特伊斯兰圣城麦加朝觐的旅游组织工作。对于所有体力和经济条件允许的穆斯林，朝觐是在一生中都必须至少完成一次的功课。

然而，2018年的《宗教事务条例》出台后，中国官方却开始打击这种朝觐活动，2020年，中国官方要求所有朝觐活动都必须由隶属于统战部的中国伊斯兰教协会来组织。

因为这些限制，马彦虎在2020年便按照条例规定，停止了带团去麦加，仅帮助信众预订机票和申请签证。然而，2023 年 4 月 24 日，马彦虎依然被捕，被捕的罪名是“非法经营，扰乱市场秩序”。六个月后，他的罪名又变成了“非法越境”，并被判处有期徒刑8年。

马彦虎提出了上诉。他认为，所有朝觐活动必须通过中国伊斯兰教协会，且该协会还收取服务费，这违反了《反垄断法》，但上诉被驳回。

在辩白中，马彦虎说，“如果他们判定某人有罪，那么该人就必定有罪，无论事实和法律如何。这是对中国法律尊严的公然践踏，是对国家司法制度的无情嘲讽。”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Student feedback:
http://611Study.ICU The school on the list is Zhengzhou Foreign Language New Fengyang School.
The senior year was originally scheduled to start on the 5th, but on the afternoon of the 4th, it was suddenly notified that the class would be changed to online classes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, netizens reported to the Chuzhou City Education Bureau of Anhui Province that Dingyuan Middle School in Chuzhou City started school early. The Education Bureau responded: If you don't go to school early, it's over. What's there to report? If he violated the rules, you just don't follow the rules. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886927416653754368/pu/img/G2epz_mNy4ABVHqP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States Postal Service (USPS) announced on February 4 that it would suspend the acceptance of parcels from mainland China and Hong Kong from the 4th until further notice.
The USPS statement said that letters and ordinary mail are not included in the suspension of acceptance.
The US Postal Service did not immediately comment on whether this was related to the change in US President Trump's termination of "minimum" shipments from China and other countries. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi_9pPAa4AEt1xM.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 5, Zhao Lijian’s wife “Da Cong and Chou Ya Tou” posted a message saying, “The wife of a Pakistani embassy staff member has advanced lymphoma. After more than half a year of treatment by an old Chinese doctor, she went to a western hospital for a checkup and all indicators were normal.” In addition, she also shared a Chinese medicine prescription. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjAviVVbIAAqKDk.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump is reportedly considering adding Shein and Temu to the "forced labor" list.
Reuters quoted Semafor as saying that the US President Trump's administration is discussing whether to include Chinese e-commerce retailers Shein and Temu on the "forced labor" sanctions list of the US Department of Homeland Security (DHS).
The report quoted sources as saying that the Trump administration has not made a final decision on the matter and may eventually give up on including it on the list. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjAzFZaaAAAN0MS.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 5, Zhao Lijian’s wife “Da Congminghe Chou Yatou” posted a message saying, “The wife of a Pakistani embassy staff member is in the late stage of lymphoma. After more than half a year of treatment by an old Chinese doctor, she went to a Western hospital for a check-up and all indicators were normal.” In addition, she also kindly shared a Chinese medicine prescription.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 3, Zhou Shifeng, a human rights lawyer involved in the 709 case, filed a complaint with the Beijing Internet Court, suing Tencent, accusing the company of violating his right to freedom of communication, personal dignity and property rights by permanently banning his WeChat account on November 22 last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangxi, a woman posted a message saying that her cousin, who was born in 1985, was unmarried and childless, and her father could not stand her raising a cat as a child, so in order to force her to get married and have children, he slaughtered and ate her one-year-old cat.
